steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Compare' group, click on the 'Compare' button.
Click on the 'More' button to specify the documents to merge.
In the 'Combine Documents' dialog box, click on the 'Add File' button.
Browse and select the first document to merge.
Repeat steps 6-8 to add the second document to merge.
Click on the 'OK' button to start the merge process.
Review the merged document and make any necessary edits.
Save the merged document with a new name.
